movie.title: Schneider vs. Bax
movie.description_intro: Schneider, a hit man, gets a call from Mertens on the morning of his birthday. He has a rush job for Schneider who refuses it, because it is his birthday and he has promised Lucy, his wife, to help her with the preparations for the dinner party. Mertens insists that it is an important matter. Schneider is told that the target is Ramon Bax, a writer. He lives alone in a secluded place. "It's an easy job. With a little luck you're back home before noon." Schneider accepts the assignment. What seems to be a simple job turns out to be more than expected.

movies.title: Andover
movies.summary: A genetics professor clones his dead wife, over and over, in a desperate attempt to get her back exactly as she was.
movies.description_full: A genetics professor clones his dead wife, over and over, in a desperate attempt to get her back exactly as she was.
movies.synopsis: A genetics professor clones his dead wife, over and over, in a desperate attempt to get her back exactly as she was.

movies.title: Go-Go Sisters
movies.summary: Go-go sisters brings together two parallel stories about young ambitious teenage girls and middle-aged women who have experienced life's sweet spiciness.
movies.description_full: Go-go sisters brings together two parallel stories about young ambitious teenage girls and middle-aged women who have experienced life's sweet spiciness.

movies.title: Santa & Cie
movies.summary: When all the elves get sick, Santa must find a cure on Earth to save Christmas.
movies.description_full: When all the elves get sick, Santa must find a cure on Earth to save Christmas.
movies.synopsis: When all the elves get sick, Santa must find a cure on Earth to save Christmas.

movies.title: Forever Young
movies.summary: Xavi goes down to his family holiday home in Spain where he meets his best friends. As a gang they enter a race to win the magic tree house where Xavi can wish for his Dad to come back after his parents split and his mum re-marries. During the holiday Xavi learns about love for girls and learns how to accept his step dad after lying to his friends. And as a gang they build a cart that will hopefully win the race.
